page.title: 08ORCHARDTOWN HOME BAKERY
page.content: The bakery was finished in October 1983 and the completed length is 100 feet. We started the bakery business in 1980 and have been in business for five years. There are two ovens,{a deck oven and a {rack oven.}There is a main{cooling {fridge}and also{three main mixers.} Eight people work in the bakery.There are four bakers and one apprentice baker, two breadmen and one cleaner. The bakers start at{midnight}and work an eight hour shift. {55}bags of flour are used every week with a total of{3500lbs}of dough being made up. Every day there are between{900 and {1000}packets of bread and loose goods produced. The produce is delivered to retail shops and hotels. A total of{ {30}shops are delivered to each day. { }
